full_summary:
**Tender Announcement:** Photo Interpretation Services for the National Forest Inventory

The Canadian Forest Service, on behalf of Natural Resources Canada, invites tenders from qualified suppliers for a Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) to provide professional photo interpretation and digital data capture services for land cover mapping in National Forest Inventory (NFI) photo plots.

**Contract Reference:**  cb-737-65237923

**Solicitation #:** NRCan-5000072883

**Publication Date:** December 7, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** January 19, 2024 (17:00:00)

**Amendment Date:** January 19, 2024

**Contract Duration:** Up to 5 years, with option periods for up to 3 one-year extensions.

The successful supplier(s) will provide photo interpretation and digital data capture services for land cover mapping in NFI photo plots, in support of the National Forest Inventory Project. The scope of work includes:

* Satellite-based imagery acquisition and processing
* Photo interpretation and data analysis
* Digital data capture and mapping

**Eligible Suppliers:**

* Suppliers must be registered in the Government of Canada's Supplier Registration System (SURE)
* Suppliers must have a valid DUNS number
* Suppliers must have a valid CRA Business Number

**Tender Documents:**

* Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA)
* Amendments and associated attachments
* Tender Description (EN, FR)

**Submission Requirements:**

* Suppliers must submit a completed and signed quote in response to this RFSA
* Suppliers must provide a detailed description of their proposed services and costs
* Suppliers must identify any relevant experience and qualifications

**Contact Information:**

Gerald Baran
Phone: (778) 350-9373
Email: [gerald.baran@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca](mailto:gerald.baran@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca)

**Notice Details:**

* Solicitation Type: Request for Supply Arrangement
* Notice Type: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Notice Status: Expired

**Attachments:**

* [List of attached documents]

Please note that all attachments are available through the Canada Buys website. Suppliers are invited to submit their quotes electronically through the Canada Buys website. диза
